page.title: 06INDUSTRY IN THE HEDON AREA
page.content: {British Petroleum,Saltend.} B.P.Saltend was built on agricultural land in 1922 and was established by Herbert Green.{Saltend}is one of the most important chemical plants in this country.In the late 1920s it employed 200 people.Nowadays 1400 people work at this site. At school,out of 290 children,48 of them have parents working at B.P.There are 3 main plants producing chemicals at Saltend.The main chemical produced is {Acetone}which is used in the manufacture of plastics.The chemical plant is so large that the workers use bicycles to travel from one plant to another.The raw materials used in the manufacture of chemicals at Saltend are brought in by sea tanker,rail,road and pipelines from the {North Sea.}
